About.aboutDescription:
My name is Yarelly, and I come from the land of llamas, ceviche, and the mysterious Macchu Picchu. 

After spending several years immersed in the world of luxury hospitality, I realized that the fast-paced rhythm just wasn't for me anymore. 

Weekends and holidays away from family start to take their toll after a while. 

So… how did I end up writing code? 

Scroll down to discover the story!
